head.supplied: 23/7/78. ¶ ¶ At last, dear Mr Ramsay, I have found the mislaid rushes from N.Z. I return them now; to examine them closely for specific naming it will be necessary to get full specimens with roots. ¶...

div.p: ML MSS.562, Letters to E. P. Ramsay 1862-91, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.
At last, dear Mr Ramsay, I have found the mislaid rushes from N.Z. I return them now; to examine them closely for specific naming it will be necessary to get full specimens with roots.
Please telegraph to me, should a chance arise of a war-ship going to New Guinea or some other fair opportunity
